text: Willy Baumgärtner (23 December 1890 – 16 November 1953) was a German footballer. At age 17 years and 104 days, he was the youngest ever player of the German national team. ==Other websites== * Kicker Fußball-Almanach 2011: Mit aktuellem Bundesliga-Spieler-ABC, Stiebner Verlag, 2010. pp 114. * Uwe und die Auswanderer, DFB, 29 October 2011. Category:1890 births Category:1953 deaths Category:German footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Sportspeople from Berlin
title: Willy Baumgärtner
